lead_paragraph: DULSKY--Arlene. Died peacefully on April 12, 2016 in Riverdale, NY. She was born Arlene Garod in Brooklyn, NY in 1932. After graduating at age 20 from Brooklyn College, she married Beryl I. Dulsky, her adored husband of 64 years, who survives her. In her thirties, while raising a young family, she obtained a master's degree in Early Education from Queens College and worked in that field in New York and Arizona. She was the loving mother of Lisa (Matthew Watkins), Amy (John Little), and Ethan (Shelley Griffith). Wonderful grandmother of James, Peter, Ellen, Eleonora, Meghan, Andrea and Joel. A lover of music, travel, and close friends; and most of all devoted to her family. Service and interment are on April 15, 2016 at 1:15pm at the Sanctuary of Abraham and Sarah in the New Cedar Park Cemetery in Paramus, NJ. Shiva will observed after the service and on Sunday, April 17 at the Hampton Inn and Suites, 160 Corporate Dr., Yonkers, NY. 1/3
